title: Confirm Reefer Power Connection
description: A reefer container has been stacked in the yard. A technician must confirm it has been plugged into a power source.

tasks.description: Receive a work order to plug in a newly arrived reefer container at a specific yard location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician's mobile device receives the job to connect the reefer.

tasks.description: Physically plug the reefer's power cable into the corresponding power socket on the reefer rack.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician connects the power cable.

tasks.description: Update the work order as 'complete' in the mobile system, which updates the TOS to show the reefer is now powered on.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician marks the job as complete, and the container's status in the TOS changes to 'Powered'.
